TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: The device that produced that stone is strange. I have never encountered anything of its sort elsewhere. Though it is invisible even to my third eye, I have still succeeded in extracting some of the contents of its memory.

SOLANUM: I am still in the process of decoding it but what I have found so far is intriguing. I am confident that it was not built by Nomai, yet it contains a database of our language. I wonder who could have created it.
